generation

Class MazeBuilderEller

  • java.lang.Object
    • generation.MazeBuilder
      • generation.MazeBuilderEller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class MazeBuilderEller
extends generation.MazeBuilder
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This algorithm can build a maze in comparebly shorter time because it does not need to visit every cell.
    Author:
    ShawnSun

      void generatePathways()
      Eller's algorithm checks each row; randomly delete walls -> merge sets -> delete downward walls of each set -> create new sets for other cells not included in existing sets -> randomly delete walls -> ...
